short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle Custom Code Panel size on Webflow. Created by Aviv @ www.avivwd.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension helps users write custom code in the Webflow platform.

Webflow's custom code panels are very small, which makes the code writing and editing pretty hard. This extension adds a small button to the interface that toggles a classname which expands the panel and contracts it.
